extension.description: Full-featured Jellyseerr and Overseerr integration for Kodi. Browse, search, and request movies and TV shows with advanced features including: request status indicators, favorites/watchlist, collections, statistics dashboard, season selection, quality profiles, API caching, detailed media info, context menus, and smart notifications.
extension.news: v2.0 (2025-12-18) - Added request status indicators (Available, Pending, Processing) - Implemented local favorites/watchlist system - Added season/episode selection for TV show requests - Quality profile selection support - Collections browsing - Statistics dashboard - Recently added content section - Advanced pagination with jump-to-page - Detailed media information viewer - Context menu support (Show Details, Add to Favorites) - API response caching for improved performance - Request cancellation support - Enhanced notifications (processing, approved, available) - Connection test in settings - Request templates and preferences - Issue reporting functionality - Settings backup/restore - Confirmation dialogs before requests - Duplicate request detection - Many UI/UX improvements
